overview: 8mm film by Yoko Oguchi, 2013. Yamada (Sato Taketo) falls in love in first sight with a girl named Maki (Shimano Hozo) sitting on the side of the road. However, Maki is a rather eccentric individual who acts in accordance with orders picked up by her brain. Paying no heed to the warnings of a friend, the simpleminded Yamada falls deeper in love with Maki.
title: Ai no ibara
